```{r echo=FALSE}
library(htmltools)

portfolio_card <- tags$div(
  class = "portfolio-container",
  tags$a(
    class = "portfolio-card",
    tags$img(
      src = "images/t_76bc4d4f3c9741609487d714b1df0926_name_Calves_What_you_need_to_know_62d0330f99af086f6b7e30b3_1_Jul_14_2022_15_29_52_poster.jpg",
      alt = "Web Design Project",
      class = "card-image"
    ),
    tags$div(
      class = "card-content",
      tags$h3("E-commerce Website", class = "card-title"),
      tags$p(
        "A fully responsive e-commerce platform with product filtering and secure checkout.",
        class = "card-description"
      ),
      tags$p("June 2023", class = "card-date")
    ),
    tags$button(
      "View Project", href = "cv.qmd",
      class = "view-project-btn"
    )
  )
)
